string-array.name: about_paragraphs
string-array.item: Bartleby puts free property information from public data sources on a map.
Unlike its namesake and the government websites it pulls from, Bartleby would prefer to make public data easily available.

Bartleby uses Caustic scraping templates to learn where to pull data from, and how to utilize information it has already pulled to find out more. Contribute to Caustic templates! Your submissions make Bartleby even more powerful.
